item.title: 장국영 - To you
item.description:
작곡: Sung by
KY: 3120

In the rain
I’m standing here
I’m all alone
and missing you
I never want to let
you go that way
In the rain
I’m all alone
Running in the rain
for you
I wanna give my life
to you to you
I remember the days
when we were happy
and so gay
I remember the days
we lived in perfect
harmony
For so many times
I let you down
So many times
I made you cry
Never meant to be
that way
I only want to say
ye-i
For so many times
I let you down
So many times
I made you cry
Never meant to be
that way
I only want to say
send my love to you.

In the rain
I’m standing here
I’m all alone
and missing you
I never want to let
you go that way
In the rain
I’m all alone
Running in the rain
for you
I wanna give my life
to you to you
I remember the days
when we were happy
and so gay
I remember the days
we lived in perfect
harmony
For so many times
I let you down
So many times
I made you cry
Never meant to be
that way
I only want to say
ye-i
For so many times
I let you down
So many times
I made you cry
Never meant to be
that way
I only want to say
send my love to you.
